work-item.field:
In default configuration time which is booked on tasks or defects isn´t calculated automatically to their requirements they are implementing.
As a project manager you might want to generate reports how much time it took to implement specific requirements without checking all subtasks.
Open Administration>Work Items>Calculated Fields and setup calculated field timeSpent for work item type "Requirement"
  • Set "Calculated Field ID" to "timeSpent"
  • Set calculation to sum and add timeSpent as "Source Field ID" calculated from "Child field"
  • Verify calculation is working in frontend by inserting an initial estimate to a requirement and book some time on sub task which is linked to your requirement via "implements" link role
Calculate time spent of your implementing tasks and defects to your requirements
